mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Travel_Records (user_id, title, start_date, end_date, total_cost, theme, is_public, image_urls) VALUES ( (SELECT id FROM Users WHERE email = #{userEmail}), #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{totalCost}, #{theme}, #{isPublic}, #{imageUrls, typeHandler=com.ssafy.travelog.config.JsonListTypeHandler} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, u.email AS userEmail, u.nickname, t.title, t.start_date AS startDate, t.end_date AS endDate, t.total_cost AS totalCost, t.theme, t.is_public AS isPublic, t.image_urls AS imageUrls, t.created_at AS createdAt FROM Travel_Records t JOIN Users u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE t.is_public = true ORDER BY t.created_at DESC

SELECT t.id, u.email AS userEmail, u.nickname, t.title, t.start_date AS startDate, t.end_date AS endDate, t.total_cost AS totalCost, t.theme, t.is_public AS isPublic, t.image_urls AS imageUrls, t.created_at AS createdAt FROM Travel_Records t JOIN Users u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE u.email = #{email} ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
